Class-Sorcerer 20 -- Male Half-Elf Sorcerer: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 20 (+5)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: None
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 5; Class: 10; General: 5; Skill: 10 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Sorcerer (Bloodline)
Feats: Adapted Cantrip; Advanced Bloodline; Arcane Evolution; Armor Proficiency; Assurance (Demon Lore); Assurance (Performance); Bespell Weapon; Bloodline Conduit; Bloodline Focus; Bloodline Perfection; Bloodline Resistance; Bloodline Wellspring; Canny Acumen (Reflex); Canny Acumen (Will); Cantrip Expansion; Clever Improviser; Cooperative Nature; Counterspell; Crossblooded Evolution; Dangerous Sorcery; Divine Evolution; Effortless Concentration; Enhanced Familiar; Familiar; Fast Recovery; Greater Bloodline; Greater Crossblooded Evolution; Greater Mental Evolution; Greater Vital Evolution; Haughty Obstinacy; Interweave Dispel; Magic Sense; Metamagic Mastery; Natural Skill; Occult Evolution; Overwhelming Energy; Primal Evolution; Quickened Casting; Reach Spell; Reflect Spell; Skill Training (Abyss Lore); Skill Training (Acrobatics); Skill Training (Astral Plane Lore); Skill Training (Crafting); Skill Training (Mining Lore); Skill Training (Performance); Skill Training (River Lore); Skill Training (Scouting Lore); Steady Spellcasting; Untrained Improvisation; Widen Spell Sorcerer Features: Aberrant; Ability Boost (Charisma); Ability Boosts; Alertness; Angelic; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Bloodline Paragon; Bloodline; Defense Trained (Unarmored Defense); Defensive Robes; Demonic; Diabolic; Draconic; Elemental; Expert Spellcaster; Fey; General Feats; Hag; Imperial; Legendary Spellcaster; Lightning Reflexes; Magical Fortitude; Master Spellcaster; Perception Trained; Resolve; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Signature Spells; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Sorcerer Feats; Sorcerer Skills; Sorcerer Spellcasting; Sorcerer Weapon Expertise; Undead; Weapon Specialization Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage

Sorcerer Feats: 10 selections
Enhanced Familiar: Can select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Familiar: May have a familiar
Greater Vital Evolution: Allows casting two additional spells of different levels after spell slots in each level are exhausted once per day
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Light Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Sorcerer Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, and +4 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Bloodline Resistance: +1 vs. spells and magical effects
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 5; A10: 2; A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; A6: 4; A7: 4; A8: 4; A9: 4; D0: 5; D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 5; O0: 5; O10: 2; O1: 4; O2: 4; O3: 4; O4: 4; O5: 4; O6: 4; O7: 4; O8: 4; O9: 4; P0: 5; P10: 2; P1: 4; P2: 4; P3: 4; P4: 4; P5: 4; P6: 4; P7: 4; P8: 4; P9: 5 Focus Points: 21 Attack: Arcane: +33 (charisma; legendary); Divine: +33 (charisma; legendary); Occult: +33 (charisma; legendary); Primal: +33 (charisma; legendary) Spell DC: Arcane: 43 (charisma; legendary); Divine: 43 (charisma; legendary); Occult: 43 (charisma; legendary); Primal: 43 (charisma; legendary)
Spells:
Aberrant Whispers (O3 Enc): (1) 5' emanation (2/3 actions give a 10'/15' emanation) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases radius by 5')
Abyssal Wrath (D5 Evo): (2) 60' cone inflicts 4d6 HP of random type: bludgeoning and electricity; acid and slashing; bludgeoning and cold; fire and piercing (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Ancestral Memories (A1 Div): (1) Caster becomes trained in choice of non-Lore or ancestral Lore skill for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes expert in chosen skill)
Angelic Halo (D1 Abj): (1) 15' emanation increases the effects of Heal by double the Heal spell's level
Angelic Wings (D3 Evo): (2) Caster may fly at full Speed and casts a 30' radius bright light for 3 rd (heightened 5th effects last 1 min)
Arcane Countermeasure (A5 Abj): (R) R120' Reduces target spell's level by 1 if heightened and gives that spell's targets +2 saves, skill checks, AC, and DC against it
Celestial Brand (D5 Nec): (1) R30' Caster and allies gain +1 attacks and skill checks vs. evil target, and attacks by good creatures inflict +1d4 HP good (heightened +2 good creature attacks inflict +1 HP good)
Diabolic Edict (D1 Enc): (1) R30' Target performs stated task, gaining +1 attack and skill checks, for 1 rd; refusal inflicts -1 attack and skill checks for 1 rd
Dispel Magic (A2 Abj): (2) R120' Allows a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dragon Breath (A3 Evo): (2) 30' cone or 60' line inflicts 5d6 HP energy (save basic Fortitude or Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Dragon Claws (A1 Tra): (1) Caster's fingers inflict 1d6 HP slashing and 1d6 HP energy, and caster gains resistance 5 to energy, for 1 min (heightened 5th inflicts 2d6 HP slashing and gains resistance 10; 9th inflicts 3d6 HP slashing and gains resistance 15)
Dragon Wings (A5 Tra): (2) Caster gains 60' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 8th effects last 10 min)
Drain Life (D3 Nec): (1) R30' Target suffers 3d4 HP negative, and caster gains equal temporary HP (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Elemental Blast (P5 Evo): (2) Choice of 30' cone, 60' line, or R30' 10' burst inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning or fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Elemental Motion (P3 Evo): (2) Caster may fly at full Speed, swim at full Speed and breathe water, or burrow at 10' for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +10' Speed; 9th gives +20' Speed)
Elemental Toss (P1 Evo): (1) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d8 HP bludgeoning or fire (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Embrace The Pit (D3 Tra): (1) Caster gains resistance 5 to evil, fire, and poison, resistance 1 to non-silver physical damage, and weakness 5 to good for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance to evil, fire, and poison, +2 resistance to non-silver physical damage, and +5 weakness to good)
Extend Spell (A3 Div): (1) Duration of subsequent targeted spell of less than maximum spell level increases from 1 min to 10 min
Faerie Dust (P1 Enc): (1) R30' 5' burst (2/3 actions give a 10'/15' burst) inflicts loss of Reactions and -2 Perception and Will for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts -1 Perception and Will for 1 min) (heightened +3 increases burst radius by 5')
Fey Disappearance (P3 Enc): (1) Caster becomes invisible and may ignore natural difficult terrain until the end of next turn; performing a hostile action ends invisibility (heightened 5th hostile action does not end invisibility)
Fey Glamour (P5 Ill): (2) R30' 30' burst cloaks 10 targets for 10 min
Glutton's Jaws (D1 Nec): (1) Caster's bite inflicts 1d8 HP piercing, giving caster 1d6 temporary HP, for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +1d6 temporary HP)
Grasping Grave (D5 Nec): (2) R60' 20' radius inflicts 6d6 HP slashing and -10' Speed for 10 min (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and immobilized) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Hellfire Plume (D5 Evo): (2) R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP evil (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP fire and evil)
Horrific Visage (O3 Ill): (2) 30' radius inflicts frightened 1 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 2) (heightened 5th inflicts frightened 1/2/3 and fleeing for 1 rd on save success/failure/critical failure)
Jealous Hex (O1 Nec): (1) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, drained 1, or stupefied 1, based on target's highest ability modifier, until target saves up to 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts condition level 2)
Swamp Of Sloth (D3 Con): (1) R120' 5' burst (10'/15' burst for 2/3 actions) inflicts difficult terrain and 1d6 HP poison for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +2 increases burst radius by 5' and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Tentacular Limbs (O1 Tra): (1) Extends caster reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10', and adding another action to touch spells extends reach to 20', for 1 min (heightened +2 adding another action extends touch spell reach to 30')
Undeath's Blessing (D1 Nec): (1) Touched gains undead responses to Heal and Harm for 1 min, and Harm restores +2 HP (save Will Heal and Harm have half effect; critical success negates) (heightened +1 Harm restores +2 HP)
Unusual Anatomy (O5 Tra): (1) Caster gains darkvision and resistance 10 to precision and critical damage and inflicts 2d6 HP acid on non-reach melee attackers for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistances and inflicts +1d6 HP acid)
You're Mine (O5 Enc): (2) R30' inflicts stunned 1 for 1 rd and allows caster to direct 1 target action (save Will inflicts stunned only; critical success negates; critical failure allows control for 1 rd) (heightened 7th controls for 1 rd; critical failure allows control for 1 min or until save)
Magic Notes:
Aberrant: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows the Tentacular Limbs occult spell
Advanced Bloodline (Aberrant): Knows the Aberrant Whispers occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Angelic): Knows the Angelic Wings divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Demonic): Knows the Swamp Of Sloth divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Diabolic): Knows the Embrace The Pit divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Draconic): Knows the Dragon Breath arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Elemental): Knows the Elemental Motion primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Fey): Knows the Fey Disappearance primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Hag): Knows the Horrific Visage occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Imperial): Knows the Extend Spell arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Bloodline (Undead): Knows the Drain Life divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Angelic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Angelic Halo divine spell
Bloodline Paragon: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Bloodline Perfection: +1 10th level spell slot
Bloodline: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Demonic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Glutton's Jaws divine spell
Diabolic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Diabolic Edict divine spell
Divine Evolution: +1 D9 slot for Heal or Harm
Draconic: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Knows the Dragon Claws arcane spell
Elemental: Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows the Elemental Toss primal spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Fey: Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows the Faerie Dust primal spell
Greater Bloodline (Aberrant): Knows the Unusual Anatomy occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Angelic): Knows the Celestial Brand divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Demonic): Knows the Abyssal Wrath divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Diabolic): Knows the Hellfire Plume divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Draconic): Knows the Dragon Wings arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Elemental): Knows the Elemental Blast primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Fey): Knows the Fey Glamour primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Hag): Knows the You're Mine occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Imperial): Knows the Arcane Countermeasure arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Greater Bloodline (Undead): Knows the Grasping Grave divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Hag: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows the Jealous Hex occult spell
Imperial: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Knows the Ancestral Memories arcane spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Primal Evolution: +1 P9 slot for Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus
Undead: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Undeath's Blessing divine spell
Aberrant: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster or target +2 Will saves for 1 rd
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Angelic: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster or target +1 saves for 1 rd
Arcane Evolution: Allows learning 1 additional spell from spellbook each day, treating it as a signature spell if it is in repertoire
Bespell Weapon: (F) Allows casting a non-cantrip spell to also cause a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of turn; damage type depends on the spell school
Bloodline Conduit: (1) Allows casting instantaneous spells of 5th level and lower without expending a spell slot
Bloodline Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Bloodline Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to counteract a spell with the same spell
Crossblooded Evolution: Allows adding 1 spell from a different tradition to repertoire
Dangerous Sorcery: Casting an instantaneous harmful spell inflicts additional damage equal to its level
Demonic: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster +1 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts -1 AC on target for 1 rd
Diabolic: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster +1 Deception for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell level
Draconic: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster or target +1 AC for 1 rd
Effortless Concentration: (F) Extends the duration of 1 spell
Elemental: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster +1 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning or fire per spell level for 1 rd
Fey: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster or target concealment for 1 rd
Greater Crossblooded Evolution: Allows adding 3 spells of different levels from different traditions to repertoire
Greater Mental Evolution: Adds 1 spell of each level to repertoire
Hag: Casting a bloodline spell inflicts 2 HP mental per spell level (Will negates) on first successful attacker for 1 rd
Imperial: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster or target +1 skill checks for 1 rd
Interweave Dispel: (1) Expends a spell slot to add Dispel Magic effects to a successful single-target spell
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Metamagic Mastery: Allows using a 1-action metamagic effect as a free action
Occult Evolution: Allows temporarily adding 1 unknown mental spell to repertoire each day
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: Allows causing a successful Counterspell to inflict the spell effects on the caster
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
Sorcerer Spellcasting: Allows learning spells from the Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal tradition
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Undead: Casting a bloodline spell gives the caster 1 temporary HP per spell level for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP negative per spell level for 1 rd
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
